choices: Dive into a Celebrity or Athlete
Check out the site again in the morning
1.content:
Browsing the net on a Spring Night in April, Martin (You) decide to log off and call it a night until you get a popup.

"I thought my blocker was on."

You take a look at the popup and see the press of a new MMO game called "Sim-U-Dive". Not really thinking at all, you decide to look for a bit.

The site immediately loads up and you see a a space to type into. You see the space that says:

Life: ::empty::

(Enter name of person you wish to become)

"Become? What is this?"

You look around for other options and find a list of preferences, but there are so many that you decide to ignore it for now. Under the box where you input the name is the button named "DIVE" which is grayed out.

For the hell of it, you put in a name and click the Dive button. Without a moments notice, nothing happens until you see a loading screen and your computer starts making noises.

After that, you suddenly black out and the last thing you hear a loud WHOOSH noise.

It feels as if you're falling in which you are and you land out in your backyard. You get up and look around.

"What the? Why am I outside? What the hell?"

You look around and see that you're outside your house and its light outside. You're wearing a sweatshirt and jeans since its a little chilly outside.

"Okay. Was I dreaming?"

You shake your head and head into your house. Entering the kitchen you look at the clock and see it as 9:02am. You find your three sisters Jenna, Megan, and Jessica sitting in the kitchen table eating pancakes. Kind of odd since Jenna and Jessica don't get along with Megan at all.

"What's this?" - you ask

"What's what loser?" - Jenna says

"Ha ha Loser!!" - Jessica says

"Whatever, Megan sitting with the enemy? " - you say

Megan looks at you and stays silent and depressed looking.

"Okay whats going on here?"

The three keep eating despite giving you looks. Something doesn't seem right to you, but you ignore it and head for the cubbards to eat. You pull out a bowl and get some cereal.

"Jenna, where's mom at?"

"Like I know idiot, I'm not a mind reader." - Jenna scorns

Jenna gets up, and puts her plate in the dishes. Angrily you slap Jenna in the head.

Awaiting her retaliation the weirdest thing happens: Jenna doesn't react at all but gets up and heads up to her room.

"What the........."

You look at Jenna's plate and see that she only took a bite of her pancakes and dumped them in the sink.

Paranoid you back away and wonder whats going on. You then see Jessica get up and dump her own plate in the sink. Same result, one bite and food wasted.

You sit down next to Megan and try to figure out whats going on. You and Megan are really good friends and stick by each other. She isn't very social except to you and looks up to you like a protective older brother.

"Meg, whats going on?! Megan, say something!"

Megan looks to you: "Martin, I was wondering if you could help me with my bio homework. I got a 76. I'm just not going to pass this test. Please help me."

"Meg, are you listening to me?!!! I dunno if I'm being paranoid but something off is........

Megan just stares at you blankly.

"Not you too."

You get an idea:

"How about later tonight when I'm done with my own work."

Just like that:

"Thanks man, you're the best."

Megan hugs you and gets up to leave. She reacted when you played along with her, not when you were wondering about what was going on.
You suddenly remember that game online you found, could that be it?

Tired you get up and take off your sweatshirt you were wearing. As you remove it you find a watch on your hand.

"What the hell?"

You examine it as you never seen this watch here before. It gets so tight as you remove it so it seems impossible to remove. You see the current time on the watch (April 20) and 9:11am. Below it you find a second time April 20 10:38pm. The first time seems to be ticking. You remember the second time being the exact time you were on the computer.

"Is this Sim-U-Dive?"

Megan climbs down the stairs fully dressed.

"Martin, can you take me to the art store. I need to buy some paint supplies."

You look at her but ignore her. You see some buttons below the times called "PAUSE, RESET, and EXIT"

"Yeah sis, head to the car, I'll be there in a minute."

Megan then walks to the door where the driveway is. You hit the PAUSE button and suddenly, the birds stop chirping and Megan stops in her tracks. She just stands there blinking and breathing.

"Pause mode huh?"

You walk up to Megan and wave a hand in front of her. You remove her glasses and she doesn't react. You take her long darkbrown frizzy hair mess with it and nothing happens. You take her purse and she doesn't do anything either.

"Woah......."

You look out the window to see if everyone outside pauses. Whats scary is that the neighborhood is empty. Just houses and cars in their driveways, no people at all. You leave with the kitchen door and go outside, and just like that, people appear frozen in place in a "Zombie" mode. Cars are stopped in the street. You look back into the house and don't see your sister Megan anywhere. You enter the house and Megan appears but the activity outside disappears.

"So the activity depends on where I'm at. Awesome!"

You go outside where the cars and people appear and hit PAUSE again. Everything resumes as it is as if nothing happens. Megan appears behind you ready to go.

"So Martin are we ready to go?"

"Sorry Meg, but I got other plans." - you say

You hit Exit, hoping it does what it does and then a green portal appears. You jump into it and you find yourself back in your room later at night with the computer.

"Holy shit..............." - You say amazed

You look at the computer where you inputted your own name in the person you wish to become. You check the preferences and see the time entered April 20, 9:00am as well as other familiar things, free will sliders, etc.

"I am definitely checking this out." - you say

What would you like to do now?
1.title: First Dive

11.content:
What better way than to experience life living as one of the members of your own family and playing along with the simulation. You know your own family better than anyone else so it'll be a good learning experience for you. That or mess with their lives. You have no consequences getting away with anything since the last time you were expecting someone to retaliate to you, nothing happened.

But who do you want to be?

They're five family members for you and each one is different than the other.

- Jenna (20): Elder Sister - Jenna is a good choice for ruining a life. She is extremely athletic, but has an attitude problem toward you and your sister Megan. She goes to the same college as your father and is a good track athlete in various competitions and won many awards. She's very tall and loves to compete. Her figure is very good and ripped. She has a boyfriend and despite her attitude towards you you and him are okay with each other. Getting her arrested, pregnant, or whatever would feel really great for you to do even if the experience is simulated.

- Megan (16): Middle Sister - Megan is VERY shy and gets picked on alot at school. She has no athletic ability at all and oftentimes she's alone drawing. Megan has average looks, long frizzy hair, glasses, braces, and a decent figure. Think of that Princess Diaries chick before her makeover. She's into anime, videogames, and RPG's. She doesn't have many friends except two close ones and you (Martin). You're the only one she opens up to. If you Dive as her you're mission is simply make Megan's life better in school, friends, and romance, but its up to you. She doesn't deserve any crap in her life that she gets.

- Jessica (9): Younger Sister - Jessica is a brat. Enough said. She is the goody goody Princess that strangers and old people love but when you get to know her, she's a brat. She takes her bitch lessons from Jenna as the two are obvious best friends. Playing in this simulation, you could ruin Jessica's life, make her fail in school, or do whatever. The rest is up to you.

- Bill (46): Father - Your Dad Bill is an okay guy, a laid back father figure. He's a college Professor at the same college Jenna goes to and teaches Chemistry and other assorted science subjects. In this simulation you can make it so that the marriage doesn't work out and you can divorce Helen and date others, do fatherly things, teach a class and fail the entire class, or quit and do something else.



- Helen (42) Mother - An over protective mother whose a stay at home housewife. She is obsessed with womens talk shows and goes back them in the parenting department. She leads a steady life and motto that means her kids should never touch a beer or smoke or other drug while she's still alive. She's too overprotective in letting you do whatever you want. Possible scenarios are hanging out with other mothers, partying, or doing something out of the ordinary.


Your decision.....
11.title: Family Dive

choices: Jessica had a nightmare and came in the room
111.content: Why not? Your dads a cool guy, and it would be interesting to see things from an adult perspective(respect!) and not have those kinks associated with switching genders to deal with. You type your dads name in the box, click, and suddunly, your in bed reading a book. It happens to be the new paperback version of "The God Delusion" by Richard Dawkins,the famous physicist. You've seen your dad read The Bible before,and you know that he contributes regularly to charities and is always willing to lend a helping hand to students or comrades, so you're initially confused to why hes reading an atheist track. Then you realize that it is actually a very well researched and well thought out book. You are awake and your "wife" is asleep. You lay down the book and watch TV for a little bit. Its 5:00 AM, and "I spit on your grave"(your favorite exploitation film) is on. You are somewhat getting off on this bizarre revenge tale when suddenly...
111.title: Bill (46): Professor, laidback

113.content: You tip your sister Jennas name in with a big grin on your face. 'This will be funny.', you say to yourself and tip on 'Dive'. You black out and the next thing you see is that you are standing in front of wadrobe. You look around. This was Jennas room. You begin to grin. 'Now let's see.', you look down on you. You see that you are only wearing underwear. You look through the wadrobe. 'It must be something... very short... or something very ugly looking...', you think. Then you hold on. 'How shall I do to her?'. You think about it. You could make her pregnant... You could let her become arrested... Or you could even let her boyfriend abondon her... You look into the mirror which is hanging on your left. You look at your new reflection. 'What could make you feel very worse?', you ask your reflection, 'It must be something you would never forget... well you will never get to know... I think... Nevermind I want to have by teasing you.'. You start to grin. 'Yeah this is it. I will...'
113.title: Jenna (20): Athlete, Bitch, tall

choices: You awake and feel like you have to puke.
1131.content:
'I will let you become pregnant. This will be fun.'. You look in the wadrobe for something to wear. You decided for a tight top, a mini skirt and high heels. You know Freddy likes girls who are looking like this. You can't understand why. You take a last look in the mirror and then you phone Freddy. 'Hey sweety. Wanna come over here?', you ask with the sexiest voice you could make. 'Er... sure.'. You grin, 'I'll be looking forward to it.'. Then you wait in Jennas room for him. It seems to be ages until he arrives. You open the door and walk in Jennas room with him. Right now as you are in the room you look in his face. You push him on the bed and sit down on him. You begin to remove his clothes. 'Let's start.', you think and begin having sex with him.

After you have done it you feel exhausted but it felt really good. 'Wow... I never thought it would feel like that!'. You lay back on the bed. Freddy lays an arm around you. 'Wow baby. You were better than usual.', he said to you. 'Did he mean it or is he just lying that I feel good? I hope he lies. It would be horrible if it is true!', you think. You look at him and answer him with a nod. Then you close your eyes and fall asleep. The next morning...
1131.title: let you become pregnant.'

11311.content:
"OOO..."! You bend over in pain. You head to the bathroom and feel the pains of morning sickness. Jason left.

You later go out and buy a pregnancy test and it was overwhelmingly positive(that it was true)

hehehe, "OH MOM"...
11311.title: You awake and feel like you have to puke.

choices: caring and wants to help her with her baby.
113111.content: 'FUUUCK!', you scream. 'I haven't thought about it. This game is really realistic this is for sure and if I am Jenna... and she is pregnant... This would mean I am pregnant... and have to endure it... but I want to see how her life will change. I want to see how her live will be ruined.', you think. Suddenly someone is knocking on the door. 'Anything alright in there?', your mother asks you. 'No mom...', you say while opening the door, 'Some... somekind of... mistake happened...'. She looks at you very curious. 'Mom... I am pregnant.', you say with a sad look. But inside you're grinnig as much as you can. Now her 'perfect' life gets ruined... evern if it is only a simulation. 'Oh dear...', your mother says and then she gets really...
113111.title: (Scream)

1131112.content:
"Its alright Jenna, we're a family and we will do anything to support you", your mom says

"Um,Wow"

This is getting a lttle weird for your taste, you now have to endure being pregnant as well as the sweet suport of your mother. You thought she would scream at the very least, disown her and never speak to her(as well as the rest of your family).

You spend some time in your room and try to find a way to ruin Jennas life even further, since this was a failure. "damn", you think yourself, cursing yourself for not taking into account the "Juno" effect.

But as you later found out, it wasn't that at all. Your whole family was generally very supportive. Your dad,Bill, was very calm and smiling. "I'm just glad she has a healthy attitude towards sex", he said smiling. "Just remind freddy to use a condom next time". Megan was drawing, as well as writing. Perhaps her future as an aunt gave her some inspiration. Jessica was bouncing around, making random comments, and you(Martin) was really cool about the whole situation

(sigh)
1131112.title: caring and wants to help her with her baby.

choices: Have this kid now and get it over with
11311121.content:
Other than the morning sicknesses, your revenge on Jenna is making you queasy.

You decide to look up some information online about pregnancy so you can be better prepared.

When you turn on the computer, something interesting stuns you.

When the computer starts, the first image on the screen is the Sim-U-Dive progress that you're currently in.

You look up the info about your simulation progress and a nice feature.

There on the screen is the current simulation date and it looks like you can change the time.

APRIL 29, 2008 9:11PM

You click a box under the hours and keep clicking up changing the number from 9pm to 7am.

The scary thing is that the simulation is being effected outside.

You look around you to see several things in Jenna's room changed, blankets out of place due to the time transition.

"Woah, I don't have to wait nine months then!!"

You click on the years and roll the mouse wheel and revert the years back from 2008 to 1995. You feel changes happening to you as you start getting younger and your room goes through a weird phase from being a room of an athlete to a seven year olds bedroom.

The computer is still intact so you get off the chair and look around. You're no longer pregnant and your room is pink and filled with stuffed animals. You go to the mirror and see yourself as Jenna as a seven year old. You're still wearing the Sim-U-Dive watch that is fitted to your arm.

You run downstairs and see that your parents are alot younger than before and you look over to see your own self as a four year old, Megan as a two year old baby and Jessica is nonexistant.

"Wicked awesome!" - You (As young Jenna)

You run back to your room and back to the computer. You're afraid of going any further so you return the year to 2008 and you're back to being pregnant.

You can set the date to any time you want and the simulation and yourself is affected. You roll over the months and notice your stomach is getting bigger due to the time change.

Do you want to have this kid now or be like 8 1/2 months pregnant and wait for it to happen naturally and feel what its like being a pregnant woman?
11311121.title: Computer Discovery

113111211.content:
You scroll down to a little past the due date, and click.

You are in the middle of breastfeeding?

"Eww", you say

"Eww? What, does Iggy have a problem", you here Freddy say.

"Um, no hes fine, I'm just impressed with my new cleavage"!, you smile

Iggy,huh?

"Freddy, can I have a second alone"?

"Uh,sure, I'll go and hang with Adam in the meantime, we have a match"

"Bye sweety",you say

"Bye JenJen"

This is too weird even for you. Should we continue
113111211.title: Have this kid now and get it over with

113111212.content: Before you make that decision you try a few other ages
113111212.title: Experiment time

choices: It Glitched back to 7 years old
Weirdness factor: only your body changes into 17 year old version of Jenna
1131112123.content: All of a sudden you felt your body jolt then what happened?
1131112123.title: UH OH

1133.content: But you realize that this was all fake. So none of these things will effect her. Frustrated that you could not effect Jenna in the real world, you decide to just have fun in her body. Hey it's no longer her body, it is rightfully yours. Do you want to pleasure yourself with her body or do you have something else on mind?
1133.title: something other.

choices: Stay at the bunks, unpack and mingle with everyone
Join the tour group and check out the camp
Go off on your own and have your own fun
114.content:
You type in Megan's name and hit "DIVE".

You blink then black out and immediately find yourself sitting in a school bus full of students.

You're Megan, your sister and unfortunately you're sitting alone by yourself in the back of the bus. You find Meg's backpack and take out a mirror. You see your cute sisters pretty face in sync with your facial movements. Yup, you're her.

You look down at yourself and see you wearing a polo plain T-shirt, a uniform dress, and brown sandals. You look outside and see mountains in view instead of the school. You also look around and see the rest of the people dressed in summer clothing along with packed bags which means one thing.


"HOLY HELL! WERE GOING CAMPING!" - You shout out loud in horror.

"No shit jackass!" - one of the students says as you get pelted with crumbled up papers, straws and spitballs.

Megan was the shy girl who always gets picked on at school. She has low self esteem and doesn't stand out in the hot department. Her curves are average at best, but she has a cute face with glasses and braces. She's an art, video game, and manga junkie. Her relationship with you is very good. You two are best friends and you serve as her "protective brother" because she's been through alot.

You peer outside and see that you might have a long way to go so you lie back in the seats and rummage through Megan's backpack. You find the usual things in there. binder, papers, inhaler, several manga books, as well as a sketchbook.

Pulling it out, you check out Megan's work. She has alot of drawn up characters, creatures, as well as several drawings of guys from animes. You turn the pages more and discover she's into yaoi based on the next couple of drawings.

"Holy shit!" - You

You breeze past those pages until there empty pages and decide to try out your own hand at drawing.

You're not very artistic, but if you have Megan's body, breasts and asthma, you should have her drawing skills. Taking out a blue pencil you sketch out a figure and its like second nature to you as you do indeed have Megan's talent.

Spending the hour and a half you compile over 5 drawings of nude women and several fanservicy pics.

"I didn't you were into girls Megan. Must be sad giving up on boys huh?" - Sandra, one of the cheerleaders in front of you says as she peers behind the seat to see you art.

You smirk and counter:
"Well, there's a first time for everything. You're pretty cute yourself. Wanna sit by me?" you say as you wink back to her.

Surprised Sandra moves to another seat in front of the bus.

"That's what I thought honey." You say with a smirk.

Minutes later you arrive at Clear Lake Camping Facility.

You get off with your things and are escorted to the bunks. The facility has a lodge, a huge trail that goes off in the woods, several bathroom and shower facilities and even an astronomy lab with a huge telescope. The bunks are divided into two set by gender which means you get to enjoy living with fellow girl campers, the bad news is you're Megan and you have to endure their torture.

You wander around and head to the girls bunk where you look for a bed. After searching for the 29 beds you discover that everyone has a bed except you. You go to one of the teachers and asks what to do.

"I don't know what were going to do about this Megan" - Mr Schwimmer says

"Its okay if I can stay in the guys bunk, I don't mind." - You

"We can't allow that." - Mr. Schwimmer

"Teach were not kids, were mature people and you don't need to worry about me." - You speak.

"We'll speak with the camp counselors." - the professor concludes

You're forced to wait about 20 minutes so you wander around outside the girls bunk and get a good view of the landscape.

The teacher returns:

"Alright, we discussed it and decided to go with this. Because of the lack of single beds in the girls room, we'll bend the rules a bit for you. We already spoke with the men in the bunk and they don't mind at all."

"Great." - you say. You're pretty stunned that they would let you do this considering everyone would say no to such a request in real life, but it is still a simulation after all.

You walk towards the boys bunk and see half of the student group about ready to take a tour. You are interested in this camp so you hurry to the bunks.

As soon as you enter you are greeted by a slew of eyes looking in your direction. The glares turn to disappointment and most of the fellas groan and resume unpacking. An obvious insult to you and Megan.

"I feel so welcomed....." - You say annoyed.

You find a bed in the corner of the room and decide what to do next.
114.title: Megan (16): Nerd, Shy, Artist

1143.content:
Later that night, you walk out of the bunks under pause mod laughing at some of the boys in your bunker not noticing the nerd girl casually walking out.

You resume the simulation and decide to head to the reservation down the hill that you saw earlier in the day. The reservation had a great selection of birds, raccoons, and other little animals that you want to go see.

Along with you is a big backpack filled with supplies since you're going to be out the entire night. Worst case scenario is that you replay the simulation again or simply leave and return to your real life.

"I don't want to leave like that. I wanna see this as if I'm really camping." - you say to yourself.

You pause the simulation and head to the girls bunker.

"One for the road." - You say

You cop a feel on Sandra's rack , kiss her on the forehead and leave.

"Man, they'd bust me if I did that for real." - you say laughing.

You take out a flashlight and head down the trail past the bunkers and lodge and you proceed to hike.

A half hour later you reach the Reservation and sneak inside the facility.
You look around exploring the exhibit and getting up close with some of the animals. Most of the animals stare at you, some are asleep and you pet some of the safe ones.

Suddenly you hear a commotion near the door as you try to make a run for it. You try to leap out the window, when the door opens and your caught.

"Hey!" - the voice says

"Gaaaaah, I'm sorry. I just wanted to see the animals here. I'll go back to my...." - You begin

The shadow takes shape as a young girl steps out from the shadows.

She looks to be about your body's age seventeen. She stands about 5'7, fair complexion, average breasts, her butt is a tad large. She has short black hair with red streaks on the bangs, brown eyes and twin earrings.

She steps out wearing jeans, a camisole, and a black jacket.

"Relax, I'm not with the Reservation. I'm a camper like you too." - she says

"Oh, my bad. Well I was just looking around and checking out the animals, then I was going to go on a hike." - You (as Megan)

"Hiking at this hour? You're a brave girl. You can call me Taylor." - Taylor

"My name is.... Megan. " - You

The two head outside and hang around the reservation.

"I don't think I've seen you. You from another school?" - You

"Yeah, lots of schools schedule these trips. I'm so tired of the sluts and assholes at my school, its refreshing to meet other people who share in my misery." - Taylor

"That's cool, I can't stand my school either." - you

"Why's that?" - Taylor

"Uh... well, they.... pick on me alot. Its humiliating. I hate it. I'm a... nerd, and they poke fun of me because of it. " - You say trying to stay in character

"Yeah, you get that share of assholes in school. You don't look like a nerd to me. You're.....cute. Heh heh. The glasses are a nice touch." - Taylor

Your heart skips a beat.

"Um.... ha ha. errr... nah I'm not cute, I'm just an artist." - You

"No really. Come on, lets hike together! It sucks hiking alone plus you got someone to talk with." - Taylor says smiling.

"Sure thing." - you say a little blushed .
1143.title: Meet Taylor

choices: You finally stop rolling as you and Taylor are now lost
You wake up back home shocked as the Megan simulation ends
11431.content:
The two of you hike for an hour or two. You enjoy Taylor's company more than you think. You're amazed at how realistic the interactions with Taylor are as if you two really were friends camping.

Up by a stream the two of you rest and relax. Its an extremely hot day and the night is still warm so you don't worry about covering up and warming up.

You rest your feet on the water and lie down as the gleam of the river lights the surrounding area.

"Damn, this place is beautiful." - you say

Taylor joins you and sits next to you.

"You know, people are sure missing out on nature. It's nights like these that people should stop with their high tech inventions and check out the great outdoors once in awhile." - Taylor

You nod your head.

"Listen Meg, we should hang out more often and enjoy this trip. We only have 5 days and 4 nights here left, then were back to our own schools, so lets make the best of it." - Taylor

"Sure thing, yeah its gonna suck unless we keep in touch. You really made me feel good about myself since I have some friend issues back home." - You say

Taylor smiles agreeing and than places her hand on your leg and blushes as her face meets with your. Stunned you only look at her. She removes your glasses and puts them aside.

"You really are cute without them on." - Taylor says embarrassed

Taylor locks lips with you and tenderly kisses you romantically.

You're still plagued with thoughts in your head.

Is this cheating?!

What about Sarah?!

How would this girl really feel that I'm only acting like my sister

Wait, this girl is not even real! I shouldn't even feel guilty.....

"Don't worry if this is your first time, It's mine too," - Taylor continues kissing you

Taylor stops and helps you up.

"I'm sorry. I shouldn't have done that....... I'm so sorry. You're just really cute and I.... couldn't help myself." - Taylor says

"Uh.... well........ I......." - you try to form words but nothing is working.

"Let's continue hiking." -

You nod your head and put your shoes back on. The two of you continue hiking up the trail mountain in awkward silence.

Taylor suddenly stops and heads back to you.

"I think there's a dead end over there. We should head back. " - Taylor

"I guess so." - you

"Megs, tomorrow, you want to hang out with me? I'm sorry about what I did I shouldn't have...." - Taylor

"Its okay Taylor. You just surprised me back there. I never gave you a straight answer. I never had any real friends except my brother and I'm always alone at school, but you made me really happy. I'm always depressed and alone, but being your friend, I actually felt like I'm really wanted again. And Taylor, I want to hang out with you and be around you." - You say

You hug Taylor but suddenly she pushes you away and starts tearing up.

"Whats wrong?" - You ask

"I can't do it.... It's just not the same..... Meg, you really are a special person but this cannot be.... its not real....." - Taylor

"Huh? What isn't? - You

"I was a fool and I let my emotions get the better of me. I'm so alone, but I can't be with you.....

..... You're not real. You're just a simulated character in this Sim-U-Dive game. I can't have feelings for you because you're not real." - Taylor says and then backs away from you.

"Gaaah! W-w-what did......." - You say shocked

You begin to back away stunned in fright.

You reach the end of the cliff as you slip and lose your balance.

"aaaaah. AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!"

You slip and fall over the high cliff! Down into the trees below.

"MEGAN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" - Taylor yells and jumps off after you

You collide on some trees and slide down the hillside. As you keep rolling you finally black out stunned at what just happened....
11431.title: Taylor's bombshell

choices: "Last one in, is a rotten egg!!!!"
114311.content:
Morning falls as you suddenly regain consciousness.

You look and see that you've landed on a pile of leaves. You don't notice but Taylor and you are holding in each others arms possibly from the fall. Taylor is unconscious still and you in your Meg form are still shocked by what Taylor brought up.

'This girl is a real person.

What am I going to do?

She's fallen for me, but she doesn't KNOW who I really am!

Do I keep playing as Meg or tell her straight up?

If I keep playing ignorant, maybe she won't think I'm a real person either.'


Taylor begins to stir: "Meg? Are- are you okay?"

"Yeah. That was some fall." - You say

"I'm sorry about what I said earlier. I didn't know what I was saying back there." - Taylor

"She must be saying that so the reality here stays intact. I shouldn't have reacted like I have if not to raise her suspicion.

I could simply get out of here with one click of the watch, but for the sake of having an adventure, I might as well not wimp out.

Either that or wait for her to leave the simulation" - you think

"What are we going to do? Were totally lost and I'm scratched all over!" - you say

"I say we start walking then. Can do anything else here." - Taylor

The two of you start walking for hours. Because of simulation rules the people who dives feels no hunger, pain or exhaustion. The simulations do feel this way so you try to keep an "act" going by walking frustrated and making mention of being hungry.

Four and a half hours pass.

114312.content:
You feel yourself dropping like a lead weight as you open your eyes in front of your computer monitor drenched in a cold sweat.

...........




Next morning, you get out of bed and leave to the bathroom for your morning ritual of your morning whiz.

You reach the bathroom door as your sister Megan comes out of it from taking a shower.

"Oh.... hey, Morning whiz again?" - Megan says with a smile

You were still shaken after your episode with Taylor that you couldn't face Meg either.

That and going into this dive AS her adds more to your guilt.

Meg puts on her glasses and stares you in the eye.

"H-hey, cut it out. I hate when you do this." - You say

"Because you're guilty of something. I KNOW you. Did you use that remote again? I thought you buried it in a steel box and down a 49 foot hole in the backyard. I doubt you have the manpower or insanity to dig it out after we buried that thing." - Meg

"Its not the remote! I discovered something...............else." - You

"Based on your reaction, its something weird and bends the laws of physics or something. Is it another remote? What does this one do? Switch genders, turn you into furniture, what?" - Meg

The people here are not real except you and what's amazing is that you have complete control over everything and the experience is so lifelike, its crazy!!!" - You say.

114312.title: Back to Reality

1143121.content:
You feel yourself falling into the simulated world as a ghost, a spectator as Meg had already taken her avatar.
You see her shout in horror "Holy hell we're going camping!"
Now that you were looking at Meg's Body from the outside you could see the almost shocked face you had worn when you had been her.
Meg would never have normally yelled that, so you know this is a replay of when you were Meg in the simulation, except this time Meg was in her own avatar.
You laughed as student said "No shit jackass." and she was mercilessly pelted with spitballs and paper balls.
You feel kind of bad for Meg, being the shy person, trying to stay unnoticed was a staple of her life. The little outburst she was forced to go along with must have been terrible.
Meg does not look worried though. Almost dismissing it, like you usually did with any ridicule.
You watch as Meg and the other students board the bus, the teacher telling everyone to settle in, and the driver making the bus splutter to life.
It was thirty minute trip and you wished there was a fast forward mechanic in the simulation.
You floated around Meg as she looked through her things, and start to draw.
"Meg, can you hear me?" you ask her.
Meg took no notice, didn't even bat an eyelid, but her voice still spoke. "Martin, what's this? What's going on?"
"It's a replay of my Simulation."
"You wanted to live as me? Why? And what did you make me do?"
Meg's Avatar had just finished drawing the nude girls and had moved on to the fan service pictures.
"I was just curious, seeing what your life was like, and what you could do."
Meg's voice snorted "No wonder you took so long in your morning ritual this morning. Umm...those girls I'm drawing, are they doing what I think they are doing?"
You see Sandra getting board and starting to find something that could interest her
you chuckle. "Wait, It gets better."
"Wha..."
"I didn't you were into girls Megan. Must be sad giving up on boys huh?" Sandra craned her neck over the seat to see the drawings.
"Well, there's a first time for everything. You're pretty cute yourself. Wanna sit by me?" Meg's avatar said flirtatiously and winked at Sandra.
"You didn't" Meg's voice squeaked.
Sandra had a look on her face of pure befuddlement, clearly having no clue what to do in that kind of situation, and she moved to another seat quickly.
"That felt so embarrassing, why did you do that to me?" Meg said in a small voice.
You feel a bit sorry for your sister.
"Didn't it feel good to you know, get the one up on her?" you ask tentatively.
"Yes, but...it...."
"Just trust me, the part that I'm embarrassed about will come in a bit. I'm going to work something out. Have fun"


You saw your sister walking up to the Reservation when you got back.
You learned how to end the replay and let Meg take over her avatar completely, not playing back your actions and thoughts.
The button was in your ghostly hand ready to let Meg take over. You wonder what she will do.
You followed Meg into the Reservation as she went around, admiring and petting the animals.
Taylor was at the door making noise, Making the Meg avatar jump and try to make a run for it
"Hey!" Taylor called.
"Gaaaaah, I'm sorry. I just wanted to see the animals here. I'll go back to my...."You saw Meg begin to say
"Relax, I'm not with the Reservation. I'm a camper like you too."
Taylor stepped out of the shadows. You have to look at her again. It was the same person. She looked a little above adverage in looks, but you were sure she looked better when you were Meg in the simulation.
You try jumping into Meg's avatar. A shock ran through you as you started sensing things like a normal human being again. The first thing you noticed is that Taylor now looked like stunning. Next thing you notice is that you can hear Meg's thoughts.
"oh, she's my age, and she's nice." you almost feel her relief, but also her tension at having to talk with someone.
"Oh, my bad. Well I was just looking around and checking out the animals, then I was going to go on a hike." You hear yourself in Meg's avatar say.
"Hiking at this hour? You're a brave girl. You can call me Taylor."
You feel Meg's dismay, I'm not brave. I'm a coward.
You feel shocked and dismayed at hearing this. She didn't know you could hear her thoughts. Is this what she usually thought?
"My name is.... Megan. " The avatar continued. "I don't think I've seen you. You from another school?"
"Yeah, lots of schools schedule these trips. I'm so tired of the sluts and assholes at my school, its refreshing to meet other people who share in my misery." Taylor smiled grimly
You feel a pang in your heart, exactly what Meg was feeling. "She understands..."
You loosen control of the Meg avatar a bit, letting the predetermined words fade, letting Meg talk for herself, not just you putting words in her mouth.
"I don't like school either. I...hate it." Meg murmured, her head bowed.
"Why hate?" Taylor asked softly.
"They pick on me, they...I....they say I am the nerd girl." you feel Meg's mind race "Martin wouldn't have said that, that means I'm saying it. Then why am I telling this girl so much? Oh no, I'm stammering"
"Don't worry about it, there are plenty of assholes in school. And you don't look like a nerd to me. You're.....cute. The glasses are a nice touch."
"Um, no...I'm...just...I...not..." Meg's heart skipped a beat. "I'm....cute?"
A blush stained Meg's cheeks a vivid red.
"Do yo want to hike together?"
Meg didn't give it a second thought. "I'd...yes."

Together Meg and Taylor hiked up the mountain, talking with each other.
You have never known your sister to talk so much to anyone before, so openly as she did to Taylor.
Taylor was speaking as openly as Meg was, and was a very good person to talk to.
The two friends sat down at the riverbank and Meg looked up at the stars.
"It's beautiful out here." Meg whispered in awe.
"People don't know what they're missing out on. My whole class just walked right past a sleeping owl once, they were chatting away or on their phones. Only me, my friend and the camp teacher noticed it. we all stopped and had a moment."
"Their loss." Meg smiled.
"Sometimes these camps are good for people, they give new perspectives, change minds and opinions, to hold on to things while they last."
"Do you have to think of the end just as something starts?" Meg asks.
Taylor nodded. "It makes you think of the time you have, and how to use it well."
"And what can I change? when I go back I'll have to do the same as before, spitballs and cutting words." Meg bowed her head.
Taylor put her fingers under Meg's chin and gently lifted her face so they could look into each other's eyes.
"Things can always change" Taylor whispered as she took Meg's glasses off and set them aside. "You look really cute without them on."
As Taylor starts to move in for a kiss, you feel Meg's mind race, her conflicting emotions.
You knew Meg couldn't back down, her actions still guided by the simulation playback.
Taylor met Meg's lips, tenderly and lovingly. Meg's heart skipped and fluttered, the breath seeping out of her body.
If the simulation replay continues then Meg would back out, so you end the replay, giving Meg in her avatar complete control over her actions.

info.brief_description: You are welcomed to a new PC 3D game where you live as other people. More in description.
info.description:
When browsing the net, you stumble upon a new MMO game that allows you to "Dive" into a simulated world that looks exactly like earth. You can choose to become anybody in the world in this simulation and live their lives, whether its a celebrity, actor, actress, or even your own life, friends, family or other people.

The world inside is an exact copy of earth except for a few rules to the player:

- To Dive, you are given options to who you want to be. enter a name and hit "DIVE" and you'll be transported to the MMO world. You can also set up little details, like location, and other small things in this menu, but thats up to you.

- When you're inside "Sim-U-Dive", you become the person you choose before you dive. You can feel, see, touch, taste, and hear in this world. You can talk, communicate and basically do anything as you would in real life. You can eat, shop, dress, bathe, run, etc.

- The people inside are NOT real, so you can do anything to them without fear of consequences. You have FULL control and can decide to play out the scenario or see what it's like ruining someones reputation or something and seeing the results.

- Time does NOT pass when you're playing a Simulation. You can spend a week in the Sim-U-Dive, and leave and you'll return to the real world the moment you left off.

Player Options:
Inside the Dive, keep in mind that you are wearing a special watch at all times. The watch has player options which are:

- Lists the time and date in that world you're in
- Lists the real world time and date as well
- Has a "RESET" option which resets the scenario back to the moment you first arrived and you can play the sim over again with full knowledge
- Has a "PAUSE" mode. Everything including time pauses. People become zombies and don't react to you, so you can wander around without no one saying anything to you. People merely are idle, still breathing and blinking but don't do anything else, so you can do anything here.
- Exit: A huge green portal appears where you can leave the Simulation

- CHARACTERS -

Characters are the same as my "Body Swap Remote" Interactive.

- Martin (17): You - Joker, Sports fanatic
- Sarah (17): Girlfriend - smart, hot, childhood friend, anti sports
- Marco (17) Best Friend - Jokester, third Wheel, childhood friend
- Jenna (20): Elder Sister - A Bitch, extremely athletic and built, tall, college student
- Megan (16): Middle Sister - Shy, Average looks, glasses, artist, mangaka
- Jessica (9): Younger Sister - Brat, Attention Whore, Gullible
- Bill (46): Father - Chemistry College Professor, Laid back, Busy worker
- Helen (42) Mother - Motherly, Overprotective
